metadata.name: Ballet of The Broken Hearted
metadata.description:
Her loneliness growing with a gathering crowd

Her dainty walk hiding unwilling movement

Her sweet smile masking bitter shadows

Her freedom strung to public perception

With rose petals at her feet, she danced her dance;

Ballet of The Broken Hearted


------
Artwork made for MistaSpoons' contest with the theme of dancing. I had a lot of fun going out of my comfort zone with this piece!

Rewards: 
✨ A companion piece for top 2 bidders on ETH chain

✨ A thank you stamp for all bidders on polygon chain

✨ Winner gets all the above + a custom PFP derivative from me as a thank you

Dimensions: 2689 x 3825 pixels, 300 dpi
